abstract: The proliferation of small screens was the biggest threat facing Facebook. But there are increasing signs that it is turning this into an even bigger opportunity.
snippet: The proliferation of small screens was the biggest threat facing Facebook. But there are increasing signs that it is turning this into an even bigger opportunity.
lead_paragraph: Facebook deserves the benefit of the doubt about its rocketing costs. The social network’s bills jumped about 80 percent in the fourth quarter. That’s worrying — it’s twice as much as the top line grew. But all-important mobile advertising revenue doubled in 90 days. The potential profit justifies heavy investment.

headline.main: How Facebook Can Justify Its High Valuation
